title: LFM high plat
body:
Hey been looking to make a R5's team and see how far it can go!!
Team name will be made when I have 5 active members and everyone agrees on
Top-?
Jungle-?
Mid-?
AD-ME
Support-?

My mains  {{champion:104}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} 

members must be:
-Active
-Take criticism
-Have a microphone 
-Good internet connection
-NOT SELFISH!

replies.body:
I am currently Plat 3, was high Plat 2 last week. I main Support/Jungle.

Champ pools include:

Jungle - {{champion:113}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:32}} . Can also play {{champion:254}}  and {{champion:80}}  just haven't played in a while.
Support - {{champion:111}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:89}}. Currently trying to improve on {{champion:412}} .

Currently I am plat 3, in promos to plat 2.
I am a jungle main.
The champions I am most comfortable on are {{champion:79}}  {{champion:59}}  {{champion:64}}  {{champion:54}}  {{champion:56}}  {{champion:2}}  {{champion:421}}  {{champion:113}}  {{champion:14}}  {{champion:72}}  {{champion:254}}  {{champion:106}}  {{champion:62}}  {{champion:5}}  {{champion:154}} However I can play others if needed.
I currently have access to TeamSpeak and Skype but I can get others if needed

Mid/adc/sup Highly pref   
Currently plat 2
Champions: 
Mid: Orianna, Twisted fate, Cho gath, Zed, Talon,Karthus, Katarina, Annie
Adc:  All except vayne
Support: Thresh, blitzcrank, Janna, Morgana, Sona
I like your top and support champion pool ill add you
